Package com.bitwig.extension.controller.api

Interface PinnableCursorDevice

All Superinterfaces:
Cursor, CursorDevice, DeleteableObject, Device, DuplicableObject, HardwareBindable, ObjectProxy, PinnableCursor, RelativeHardwarControlBindable, Subscribable
public interface PinnableCursorDevice extends CursorDevice, PinnableCursor
Cursor that can be pinned to the current device or follow the selection.
Since:
API version 2
